page.title: 16A Typical Day in My Life
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.00 a.m. and wash and dress before going down for breakfast. I normally have cereal, toast and coffee. After this I clean my teeth and feed my rabbit and guinea pig. If there is time, I do some piano practice. I leave for school at 8.20 because we go via Bishops Stortford to take my brother to school. I live in Harlow but go to school in Hatfield Heath, which starts at 9.15. After school, I sometimes stay to one of the clubs like netball or Cycle Proficiency and then my mum picks me up. When I get home, I either watch television or go for a bicycle ride with my older sister. We have tea about 5.30 p.m. and afterwards I read, play and do some flute practice. I go to bed on a schoolday at about 8.30 p.m.
